item.title: Go head, tailor your tools
item.description: II recently heard someone else share their perspective that one should not customize their tools. I also fell into this camp, until pretty recently. The lesson of vi I made what I believed was a wise choice back in the 90s when I was first getting comfortable in unix (AIX at the time). I decided to eschew other options and learn and stick with vi, at least for editing system configuration files.
